name: Friday Night Funkin' Lullaby
storyline: One night, Boyfriend mysteriously goes missing; prompting Girlfriend to try and find him. She soon encounters a strange, yellow humanoid near a bloody trail leading into the woods. This creature beckons GF to follow him into the woods, for he says he saw BF there. But she had no idea what he has in store for her…
summary: Friday Night Funkin' Lullaby is a mod created and formerly directed by Banbuds and currently directed by ScorchVx and SimplyCrispy, that revolves around Pokémon creepypastas and urban legends.
